means: 使受痛苦，折磨( afflict的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Italy has been afflicted by political corruption for decades.
sentence.Network_cn: 几十年来意大利一直饱受政治腐败之苦。

sentence.Network_en: It is food that the afflicted want now.
sentence.Network_cn: 受苦的人们现在需要的是食物。

sentence.Network_en: About 40% of the country's population is afflicted with the disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 全国40%左右的人口患有这种疾病。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The quake - afflicted people were all provided with clothing , food and other things they needed., 为地震受灾群众提供了衣服 , 食品和其他需要的东西.
His heart was moved with infinite pity for the afflicted and suffering ones of earth ;, 他的心因受无穷之爱的激动 , 怜悯地上受苦受难的人;
what most afflicted him with the sense of nightmare was that he had never understood why the huge imposture was undertaken .有一件事情最让他觉得噩梦般骇人，便是他从来闹不清楚，为什么要这般大张旗鼓地搞欺骗。
For You save an afflicted people , But haughty eyes You abase ., 困苦的百姓 , 你必拯救 ． 高傲的眼目 , 你必使他降卑.

list.abs: We should help people in affliction ., 我们应该帮助在苦难之中的人们.
此外,还有第三种意识——烦恼识(afflicted consciousness),又称为“末那识”或思量识、作意识、相续识、分别识。烦恼识没有明性,经常都处于充满“我”的念头及.

entry.def: If you are afflicted by pain, illness, or disaster, it affects you badly and makes you suffer.

example.ex: Italy has been afflicted by political corruption for decades...
example.tran: 几十年来意大利一直饱受政治腐败之苦。

example.ex: There are two main problems which afflict people with hearing impairments...
example.tran: 听力有障碍的人们主要受到两大问题的困扰。

auth_sentence.content: Since that time, he has been afflicted with tinnitus.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since that time, he has been afflicted with tinnitus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since that time, he has been afflicted with tinnitus.

auth_sentence.content: But he didn't seem particularly afflicted with this neurosis.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he didn't seem particularly afflicted with this neurosis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he didn't seem particularly afflicted with this neurosis.

auth_sentence.content: He fled to Oxon, the common Asylum of afflicted royalists.
auth_sentence.res_content: He fled to Oxon, the common Asylum of afflicted royalists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He fled to Oxon, the common Asylum of afflicted royalists.
